title: Your bad attitude is why you and everyone around you is stuck in elo hell
body: 10/4 in 22 mins on katarina with no jungle and my team surrenders, thanks to everyones defeatist attitude i am not even allowed to carry a 4v5, so yeah elo hell sucks

replies.body: You weren't even carrying that much.
10 kills on a hyper carry isn't carrying? for christs sake i 1v3ed their adc jung and mid and nobody cared
Diana had a bigger gold advantage than you, and their team had a MUCH bigger gold advantage over your team. The game wasn't already over, but you weren't carrying. You were losing.

The problem with kat is she can't really carry like an adc can carry. Sure she can get a lot of kills and demoralize the enemy team, but she is not good at actually killing towers or taking objectives. 

That being said, I wouldn't have surrendered either.
Katarina isn't much of a hypercarry, she's strong the moment she hits 6 and her laning phase isn't too terrible due to a lack of a reasonable resource.

> she's strong the moment she hits 6
Are you serious? Her ult so bad early on that I don't even bother using it until the late game.

Eh, once she snowballs she snowballs like most midlaners. A hypercarry tends to be in the adc class, like Vayne or Kog'Maw, and they explicitly scale into the late game. Katarina is strong mid-game, like plenty of midlaners (heh).

But if you have a difference of opinion, that's fine. Hypercarry tends to be a heavily debated topic, especially with aoe and snowballing champions. So let's just agree to disagree.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1796196002/201093429?tab=overview

I think 10 kills on Kat is definitely enough to try to even out the game. 

_**However**_  You guys are down 8k gold, 5 towers at 22:30. 

I mean, you have 95 CS when almost everyone on the other team had 100+

How many towers were you down, and/or dragons?

Carrying isn't about your KDA, it's about what you can get out of them.
You do realize that while you blacked out the names in 2 places you didn't block them out in the Bold yellow has joined the channel part right?
These comments though..... Suuuure Kat can't carry now, but of course she can hella carry and 1v5 a team when you're asking for Kat nerfs -___-
